last_episode_to_air.name: Roses and Ring Boxes
last_episode_to_air.overview: On the Season 2 finale: David’s ex returns from Australia to give him a piece of her mind. Ronnie and Malika wrestle with the realities of life outside the loft. Chad tries one last time to win over Karina. Ronnie has a potentially engaging surprise for Malika. Darcy meets up with the cast six months later and is shocked by what they’ve been up to.

name: Famously Single
overview: Eight celebrities going through relationship rehab live under one roof in downtown Los Angeles and explore their romantic issues together. Through fun challenges and exercises their fame is stripped away and viewers will witness them untangle their most private emotional experiences, ripped straight out of tabloid headlines.

episodes.name: What Are THOSE?
episodes.overview: Eight single celebrities who have been infamously unlucky in love learn how to choose the right partner while living under the same roof in this series, which begins with the group moving into a spacious Los Angeles loft and receiving relationship advice from Dr. Darcy Sterling. First up: a quick icebreaker exercise; a night out on the town; and friction between Brandi Glanville and Somaya Reece

episodes.name: Who Do You Think You Are?
episodes.overview: Dr. Darcy asks the singles to step outside of their comfort zones in order to find a date for a romantic boat cruise. Later, Aubrey O'Day is confronted for refusing to participate in the exercises, behavior which frustrates her fellow celebs.

episodes.name: Will They or Won't They?
episodes.overview: The singles are ordered to throw a house party at their posh L.A. loft. In other events, Calum Best offers some insight into the dark root of his relationship issues; Pauly D. and Aubrey share a passionate kiss; and a battle erupts between Calum and Brandi.

episodes.name: Do You Trust Me?
episodes.overview: Somaya opens up about why she prefers dating women; the celebrities are paired up to coach each other; Aubrey givers her date a piece of her mind; Brandi teaches Josh to loosen up.

episodes.name: Who Do You Love?
episodes.overview: Brandi and Calum go on a date; Dr. Darcy sends the celebrities to a singles mixer; the guys choose to take a second date, throwing the loft into chaos.

episodes.name: You're Falling in Love With Me?
Where Do We Go From Here?
episodes.overview: Pauly takes Aubrey out on their first date; a party ends in a fight between Calum and Brandi; Dr. Darcy recaps what the celebrities have learned during their time with each other.

episodes.name: Date Marry Dump
episodes.overview: Eight single celebrities enter an opulent L.A. loft to get help from relationship expert Dr. Darcy Sterling. But immediately tensions flare between the celebrities and a romance begins to blossom.

episodes.name: So You're Saying There's A Chance
Fight Night
episodes.overview: The celebrities play wingman and find potential dates for each other. Karina meets someone new and finds herself torn between two men. Calum is over-served and gives everyone a piece of his mind.

episodes.name: Meet the Twins
episodes.overview: Ronnie finally meets Malika’s twin sister, who grills him on his relationship past. Conflict between Chad and Karina continues to bubble until she comes clean about her behavior. Tiffany comes clean about an interesting relationship with an ex-fiancé, and with the help of Dr. Darcy, must decide if he’s a keeper.

episodes.name: Roses and Ring Boxes
episodes.overview: On the Season 2 finale: David’s ex returns from Australia to give him a piece of her mind. Ronnie and Malika wrestle with the realities of life outside the loft. Chad tries one last time to win over Karina. Ronnie has a potentially engaging surprise for Malika. Darcy meets up with the cast six months later and is shocked by what they’ve been up to.
